Posts.EditableText:
Hey guys!
I write pretty basic (choicewise) CYOA at my own website. I focus on character creation, mood and the narrative. I would love to get some serious feedback and in return would love to test your games if you want me to. I am somewhat solitary as no one else in my network likes IF/CYOA so would love to meet some new people. 
I write stories set in the real world but with some twists and turns, making room for action, horror suspense etc. The characters you play as is also very diverse like a gangster in the 20's, a witch from the middle ages and so forth. 
Ps. i don't post the website yet as I don't know if it is allowed?

Best regards Nicolai

Posts.EditableText: CYOC of the gangster is way more appealing
